name: Jump Over Rising Stack
description:
Jump Over The Rising Stack is a fully fun packed casual arcade gameplay where you need to hold down your thumb to jump longer and higher and land safely avoiding the spikey stacks.

Gameplay:

◆ Touch, hold and release to jump ,longer
◆ Cool atmosphere with minimal style
◆ Pretty challenging gameplay
◆ Best game for casual gamers

It’s highly addictive, can you master it and lead the leaderboard?
